methods.name: isRestrictedToFixedValues

returnValue.description: If set, only fixed values are allowed

methods.description: If set, the connected field must not allow other values than the items of the FixedList. Free text must be prevented.

methods.name: isTypeaheadSupported

returnValue.description: if true, the field help should open by typing. The result might be returned asynchronously, so a Promise is used.

methods.description: Determines if the value help should be opened when something is typed into the field. Opening the value help must be triggered by the control the ValueHelp element belongs to. Note: This function must only be called by the control the ValueHelp element belongs to, not by the application.

methods.description: Triggers some logic that must be executed in ValueHelp element if a Change event on the connected control is fired. This is done if the corresponding control value is changed (not during navigation). Note: This function must only be called by the control the ValueHelp element belongs to, not by the application.

returnValue.description: true if the value help container is shown

parameters.name: sReason
parameters.description: Interaction event possibly triggering the opening of the value help

methods.description: Determines if the value help typeahead is to be opened on user interaction, navigation, or configuration changes.

methods.name: requestShowValueHelp

returnValue.description: true if the value help container is to be shown

methods.description: Determines if the value help is to be opened with a dialog or typeahead in value help mode.

methods.name: retrieveDelegateContent

returnValue.description: Promise that is resolved if all content is available

parameters.name: oContainer
parameters.description: Container instance

parameters.name: sContentId
parameters.description: ID of the content shown after this call to retrieve content

methods.description:
Retrieves delegate-based content modifications. This method may be called during the ValueHelp's opening phase, whenever a new content should be displayed for a CollectiveSearch dialog configuration or when one of {@link #getItemForValue}, {@link #requestShowTypeahead} or {@link #requestShowValueHelp} are called. So depending on the value help {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.Content Content} used, all content controls and the relevant data need to be assigned. Once they are assigned and the data is set, the returned Promise needs to be resolved. Only then does the value help continue opening or reading data.
This method returns a Promise that resolves into undefined.

methods.description:
Determines if navigation via arrow keys should be possible.

In ComboBox-like case keyboard-navigation should be anabled if closed and if open. If only typeahead is used (and maybe an value help dialog) keyboard-navigation schould be enabled only if typeahed is open.

As not all rowas might be loaded navigation with home, end, page up or dowm might be disabled, depending of the used content.

methods.description:
Determines if navigation via arrow keys should be possible.

In ComboBox-like case keyboard-navigation should be anabled if closed and if open. If only typeahead is used (and maybe an value help dialog) keyboard-navigation schould be enabled only if typeahed is open.

As not all rows might be loaded, navigation with home, end, page up or dowm might be disabled, depending on the used content.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.DefineConditionPanel
symbols.description: A DefineConditionPanel control is used inside the ValueHelp content to enter different types of conditions.

properties.name: conditions
properties.description: Sets the conditions that represent the selected values of the help. Note: A condition must have the structure of {@link sap.ui.mdc.condition.ConditionObject ConditionObject}.

properties.name: config
properties.description: Internal configuration Note: This property must not be set from outside, it used to forward the configuration of the ValueHelp

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label for the DefineConditionPanel used as panel headerText.

properties.name: inputOK
properties.description: If set, there has been no invalid user input. Note: This property must not be set from outside. It is a property because that way it can be bound to the ManagedObjectModel of the calling value help and automatically update it.

properties.name: _pagination
properties.description: Indicates if pagination is active

properties.name: _prevButtonActive
properties.description: Indicates if previous button is active

properties.name: _nextButtonActive
properties.description: Indicates if next button is active

aggregations.name: _content
aggregations.description: Internal content that is rendered.

associations.name: fieldHelp
associations.description: Optional FieldHelp. This is an association that allows the usage of one ValueHelp instance for the value fields for the DefineConditionPanel. Note: The fields are single-value input, and the display is always set to FieldDisplay.Value. Only a ValueHelp with a TypeAhead and single-selection MTable can be used. Note: For Boolean, Date, or Time, no FieldHelp should be added, but a default ValueHelp used instead.

associations.name: valueHelp
associations.description: Optional ValueHelp. This is an association that allows the usage of one ValueHelp instance for the value fields for the DefineConditionPanel. Note: The fields are single-value input, and the display is always set to FieldDisplay.Value. Only a ValueHelp with a TypeAhead and single-selection MTable can be used. Note: For Boolean, Date, or Time, no ValueHelp should be added, but a default ValueHelp used instead.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.FilterableListContent
symbols.description: Content for the {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.Container Container} element.

properties.name: filterFields
properties.description: The fields based on which the table data is filtered. For filtering, the value of the filterValue property is used. If set to $search, and if the used binding supports search requests, a $search request is used for filtering. If set to one or more properties, the filters for these properties are used for filtering. These filters are set on the ListBinding used. The properties need to be separated by commas and enclosed by "*" characters. ("*Property1,Property2*") If it is empty, no suggestion is available.

properties.name: keyPath
properties.description: The path of the key field in the content binding. If a table is used as content, this is the binding path of the key of the items.

properties.name: descriptionPath
properties.description: The path of the description field in the content binding. If a table is used as content, this is the binding path of the description of the items.

properties.name: group
properties.description:
If set, all contents with the same group are arranged together on one tab.

The label of the groups can be defined on the container via {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.Dialog#setGroupConfig setGroupConfig}.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.ListContent
symbols.description: Content for the {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.Container Container} element.

properties.name: caseSensitive
properties.description: If this property is set to true, the filtering for user input is always case-sensitive. Otherwise user input is checked case-insensitively. If $search is used, this property has no effect on the $search request. If the used back-end service supports a case-insensitive search, set this property to false.

properties.name: useFirstMatch
properties.description: If set, getItemForValue returns the first item that matches the text. In the default implementation, this is the first item that matches the entered text. Which item is used can be determined by implementing {@link module:sap/ui/mdc/ValueHelpDelegate.getFirstMatch getFirstMatch}. The matching item is returned in the typeaheadSuggested event and used for the autocomplete feature in the connected field.

properties.name: useAsValueHelp
properties.description: If set, the list is opened whenever the value help icon is pressed.

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID for the new element, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new element

constructor.description: Constructor for a new ListContent. This is the basis for various types of value help list content. It cannot be used directly. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.

Otherwise user input is checked case-insensitively. If $search is used, this property has no effect on the $search request. If the used back-end service supports a case-insensitive search, set this property to false. Default value is false.

symbols.description: Content for the {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.Container Container} element showing a condition panel.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label shown on condition panel.

associations.name: fieldHelp
associations.description: Optional FieldHelp. This is an association that allows the usage of one FieldHelp instance for the value fields for the Conditions. Note: The value fields on the conditions UI cannot be accessed from outside. The fields are single-value input, and the display is always set to FieldDisplay.Value. Only a ValueHelp with a TypeAhead and a single-selection MTable can be used. Note: For Boolean, Date, or Time types, no FieldHelp should be added, but a default FieldHelp used instead.

associations.name: valueHelp
associations.description: Optional ValueHelp. This is an association that allows the usage of one ValueHelp instance for the value fields for the Conditions. Note: The value fields on the conditions UI cannot be accessed from outside. The fields are single-value input, and the display is always set to FieldDisplay.Value. Only a ValueHelp with a TypeAhead and a single-selection MTable can be used. Note: For Boolean, Date, or Time types, no ValueHelp should be added, but a default ValueHelp used instead.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.FixedList
symbols.description: Content for the {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.base.Container Container} element showing a list with fixed values.

properties.name: groupable
properties.description: If set, the items of the list can be grouped

properties.name: filterList
properties.description: If set, the items of the list are filtered based on filterValue. If a type-ahead behavior for the connected field is wanted, this property must be set to true. For small lists, all values are meant to be shown, independent of the typing in the connected field. In this case this property must be set to false. By default, if not set, the list opens if the user clicks into the connected field. Note: if restrictedToFixedValues is set, filtering should be disabled.

properties.name: emptyText
properties.description:
If set, an item to clear the selection is added.

This item is only available if the connected field can be cleared.

properties.name: restrictedToFixedValues
properties.description: If set, the connected field must not allow other values than the items of the FixedList. Free text must be avoided. By default, if set, the list opens if the user clicks into the connected field.

aggregations.name: items
aggregations.description: Items of the value help. The key of the items is not shown in the list, but is used as a value of the connected field. If the additionalText for all the items is not used, the column will not be displayed. Note: Icons are currently not supported.

aggregations.name: _emptyItem
aggregations.description: Item for empty value (no Conditions)

methods.description:
Sets a new value for property {@link #getGroupConfig groupConfig}. Configuration for groups (collective search). The object needs to contain an entry for every possible group. The labels of every group need to have a structure of {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.content.GroupLabel}. If no configuration is provided a standard text "search and select" is used. Sample: 
{
group1: {label: "Label 1 ({0})", nnLabel: "Label 1"},
group2: {label: "Label 2 ({0})", nnLabel: "Label 2"}
}
When called with a value of null or undefined, the default value of the property will be restored. Default value is {}.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.FilterBar
symbols.description:
The FilterBar control is used to display filter properties in a user-friendly manner to populate values for a query. The filters are arranged in a logical row that is divided depending on the space available and the width of the filters. The Go button triggers the search event, and the Show Filters button shows the additional filter field.
The FilterBar control creates and handles the filters based on the provided metadata information. The metadata information is provided via the {@link module:sap/ui/mdc/FilterBarDelegate FilterBarDelegate} implementation. This implementation has to be provided by the application.
Note: The FilterBar can only be used for a {@link sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.Dialog Dialog} and not on its own.

symbols.name: sap.ui.mdc.valuehelp.Popover
symbols.description: Container for the {@link sap.ui.mdc.ValueHelp ValueHelp} element showing a popover.

properties.name: opensOnClick
properties.description: Controls the possibility to open this popover container by clicking on a connected control, even if no content enforces it. Note: By default, a type-ahead is only shown to provide suggestions when users enter input in a connected control. This property enables scenarios where popovers need to be shown earlier (for example, recommendations or recently entered values). See also {@link module:sap/ui/mdc/ValueHelpDelegate.showTypeahead showTypeahead}

properties.name: opensOnFocus
properties.description: Controls the possibility to open this popover container by focussing on a connected control. Note: By default, a type-ahead is only shown to provide suggestions when users enter input in a connected control. This property enables scenarios where popovers need to be shown earlier (for example, recommendations or recently entered values). See also {@link module:sap/ui/mdc/ValueHelpDelegate.showTypeahead showTypeahead}

parameters.name: sId
parameters.description: ID for the new control, generated automatically if no ID is given

parameters.name: mSettings
parameters.description: Initial settings for the new control

constructor.description: Constructor for a new Popover container. Accepts an object literal mSettings that defines initial property values, aggregated and associated objects as well as event handlers. See {@link sap.ui.base.ManagedObject#constructor} for a general description of the syntax of the settings object.
